FOUND-001.title: Conduct Foundation Event Storm for Foundation
FOUND-001.description:
Complete the foundation by capturing domain architecture through Foundation Event Storm.

Use these commands to populate foundation.json eventStorm field:
- fspec add-foundation-bounded-context <name>
- fspec add-aggregate-to-foundation <context> <aggregate>
- fspec add-domain-event-to-foundation <context> <event>
- fspec show-foundation-event-storm

Why this matters:
- Establishes bounded contexts for domain-driven design
- Enables tag ontology generation from domain model
- Provides foundation for architectural documentation
- Supports EXMAP-004 tag discovery workflow

See spec/CLAUDE.md "Foundation Event Storm" section for detailed guidance.

COMP-001.title: Simplify SearchBar debounce implementation
COMP-001.description: Refactor SearchBar component to use a single useEffect or custom hook for debouncing, eliminating the dependency array issue with onChangeText callback. Current implementation has two useEffect hooks that can cause unnecessary re-renders when parent doesn't memoize the callback.

JAM-001.title: Setup project dependencies and package structure
JAM-001.description: Install RTK Query, audio libraries (expo-audio, react-native-audio-pro), FlashList, environment variables support. Create rtk-services and components package directories

JAM-002.title: Configure RTK Services package with Jamendo API
JAM-002.description: Create @jamendo/rtk-services package with baseApi, jamendoApi endpoints (searchTracks, getTrackDetail), TypeScript types, and Redux store configuration

userStory.action: integrate Jamendo API using RTK Query
userStory.benefit: I can search tracks and fetch track details with automatic caching

rules.text: Base API must be configured with Jamendo API v3.0 endpoint (https://api.jamendo.com/v3.0)
All API requests must include client_id from EXPO_PUBLIC_JAMENDO_CLIENT_ID environment variable
Search endpoint must request minimal fields (id, name, artist_name, image) for optimal performance
Detail endpoint must request full track data including audio URL with mp31 format
Redux store must be configured with jamendoApi reducer and RTK Query middleware
API responses must be fully typed with TypeScript interfaces
When track detail returns empty results, endpoint must return a 'track not found' message instead of throwing an error

examples.text: Developer calls useSearchTracksQuery('jazz') and receives results with id, name, artist_name, and image fields only
Developer calls useGetTrackDetailQuery('12345') and receives full track data including audio URL
Search request is made to https://api.jamendo.com/v3.0/tracks with namesearch parameter and limit=20
Detail request is made to https://api.jamendo.com/v3.0/tracks with id parameter and audioformat=mp31
Store is created with jamendoApi reducer at 'jamendoApi' path and RTK Query middleware configured
Developer imports JamendoTrack, JamendoSearchResponse types and gets full TypeScript autocomplete
Detail endpoint transforms response array to single track object, throwing error if track not found
Developer calls useGetTrackDetailQuery('99999999') for non-existent track and receives {error: 'track not found'} response

questions.text: @human: Should the search endpoint use 'namesearch' parameter (searches track names and artist names), or should we also support other search types like 'search' (full-text) or 'artist_name'?
questions.answer: Use 'namesearch' parameter (current implementation) which searches both track names and artist names

questions.text: @human: When track detail is not found (empty results array), should we throw an error or return null/undefined?
questions.answer: Return a message 'track not found' instead of throwing an error (needs implementation change)

questions.text: @human: Should we validate that EXPO_PUBLIC_JAMENDO_CLIENT_ID is set, or let API requests fail with 401?
questions.answer: Let API requests fail with 401 - no upfront validation needed (current implementation is correct)

architectureNotes.text: RTK Query configuration using @reduxjs/toolkit with fetchBaseQuery. Base API endpoint: https://api.jamendo.com/v3.0. Search endpoint uses minimal fields (id, name, artist_name, image) for list views. Detail endpoint includes audio URL with mp31 format and musicinfo+lyrics.

Implementation change needed: getTrackDetail transformResponse should return {error: 'track not found'} for empty results instead of throwing exception. This allows components to handle track-not-found gracefully without error boundaries.

Store configuration exports configured store with jamendoApi reducer at 'jamendoApi' path and RTK Query middleware. Exports RootState and AppDispatch types for typed hooks. All API types (JamendoTrack, JamendoSearchResponse, JamendoTrackDetailResponse) exported for TypeScript autocomplete.

JAM-003.title: Configure Components package with audio players and UI
JAM-003.description: Create @jamendo/components package with ExpoAudioPlayer, AudioProPlayer, TrackCard, TrackList (FlashList), and SearchBar components

JAM-004.title: Configure environment variables and Jamendo API client
JAM-004.description: Setup .env file with EXPO_PUBLIC_JAMENDO_CLIENT_ID, update app.json for environment variables, create config.ts constants file

JAM-005.title: Integrate Redux Provider in app root layout
JAM-005.description: Update apps/example/app/_layout.tsx to wrap app with Redux Provider and configure store

JAM-006.title: Build Home page with search and track results
JAM-006.description: Implement search screen at apps/example/app/(tabs)/index.tsx with SearchBar, RTK Query integration (useSearchTracksQuery), TrackList with FlashList, and navigation to track detail

JAM-007.title: Build Track detail page with dual audio players
JAM-007.description: Implement track detail screen at apps/example/app/track/[id].tsx with ScrollView layout, track information, and both ExpoAudioPlayer and AudioProPlayer for comparison

JAM-008.title: Update navigation and tab bar configuration
JAM-008.description: Update apps/example/app/(tabs)/_layout.tsx to rename tabs, add music-related icons, and configure stack navigation for track detail page

JAM-009.title: Testing and validation of complete app
JAM-009.description: Verify API usage optimization (minimal vs full fields), test both audio player implementations, validate FlashList performance, test navigation flow, and verify Redux DevTools integration
